page.title: 17TOURISM/LONGTOWN,CUMBRIA.
page.content: INCOMING tourists visiting the Information Centre at Longtown,fall into 2 groups,the first being most numerous,are those who are calling on their way between the Lakes & the Scottish Borders,seeking info' on the Roman Wall and hail from essentially, America,Canada,Australia,& N.Z.The second group are holiday-makers staying for one or two weeks in farm-house or hotel accommodation.They are mainly European and ask for info' on fishing,sailing,historic monuments, walking,and horse-riding.OUTGOING Tourists,mainly local people booking " package-tour"holidays to Mediterranean countries in order to seek the sun. Many flights are also arranged for people to visit relatives and friends in such places as South Africa,N.Z. America,Australia,and many other destinations too numerous to mention.
